bug.author: lukas
bug.summary: wandb.log({a: b}, commit=False) doesn't save to summaryMetrics ever
bug.description: If I log something with wandb.log({a: b}, commit=False), a will never get saved in summary.

comments.comment: I just verified it gets logged once you call wandb.log() with commit=True. Did you expect it to log to summary immediately?
